item.title: World’s largest olive oil producer says ‘liquid gold’ prices on track to halve from record levels
item.description: Spain's Deoleo, the world's largest olive oil producer, says one of the most challenging moments in the industry's history appears to be drawing to a ...

item.title: Hyundai names North American exec Jose Munoz as CEO, effective Jan. 1
item.description: Hyundai Motor Co. on Thursday named Jose Munoz as the next president and CEO of the South Korean automaker, effective Jan. 1.

item.title: Vaccine maker stocks fall as Trump chooses RFK Jr. to lead HHS
item.description: Shares of Moderna, Novavax, Pfizer, BioNTech and GSK closed lower on Thursday.

item.title: Trump picks vaccine skeptic RFK Jr. for Health and Human Services secretary
item.description: Donald Trump had said that if elected president he would have Robert F. Kennedy Jr. "go wild on health." HHS oversees Medicare, Medicaid, CDC and FDA.

item.title: Major bitcoin hacker Lichtenstein gets five years in prison for crypto laundering scheme
item.description: The value of the bitcoin stolen by hacker Ilya Lichstenstein from Bitfinex in 2016 is worth more than $10 billion now.
